forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. Thunder possible. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Thunder is possible early. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Thunder is possible early. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. Thunder possible. High around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. Thunder possible. High near 60F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 64F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 17C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High near 65F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 67F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 42F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 19C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 69F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 20C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 70F. E winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
